user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart
last_action: click on the "Remove" button located at the lower left.
reflect_result:
By clicking the "Remove" button, the item that was previously in the cart has been deleted. This action aligns with your user request to clear the cart on Walmart. As a result, the cart is now empty, which is an essential first step before adding a new item, such as the USB-B cable, to the cart. Therefore, this action has made progress toward your goal of clearing the cart. 

However, the next step will be to add the USB-B cable to the cart as requested.
